trans-unit.source:
**Your paper key is the only way to restore your Litewallet if your mobile is unavailable. No one in the Litecoin Foundation team can give this paper key to you!
We will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
PLEASE MAKE BACKUPS AND DON'T LOSE IT!**
trans-unit.target:
**Your paper key is the only way to restore your Litewallet if your mobile is unavailable. No one in the Litecoin Foundation team can give this paper key to you!

trans-unit.source:
**Your LiteWallet is empty. Resetting will delete the old private key and wipe the app data.
After the reset, be prepared to record the new 12 words and keep them in a very secure place.
No LiteWallet developers can retrieve this seed for you.**
trans-unit.target:
**Your LiteWallet is empty. Resetting will delete the old private key and wipe the app data.
After the reset, be prepared to record the new 12 words and keep them in a very secure place.
No LiteWallet developers can retrieve this seed for you.**

trans-unit.source: **To reset your PIN, enter the words from your paper key into the boxes below.**
trans-unit.target: **To reset your PIN, enter the words from your paper key into the boxes below.**
trans-unit.note: Reset PIN with paper key: sub-header
Request a specific amount of Litecoin
Scan Litecoin address camera flash toggle

trans-unit.source: **Enable all security features for maximum protection.**
trans-unit.target: **Enable all security features for maximum protection.**

trans-unit.source: **The only way to access your Litecoin if you lose or upgrade your phone.**
trans-unit.target: **The only way to access your Litecoin if you lose or upgrade your phone.**

trans-unit.source: **Conveniently unlock your Litewallet and send money up to a set limit.**
trans-unit.target: **Conveniently unlock your Litewallet and send money up to a set limit.**

trans-unit.source: **Litecoin addresses are intended for single use only.**
trans-unit.target: **Litecoin addresses are intended for single use only.**
trans-unit.note: Adress already used alert message - first part

trans-unit.source: **Re-use reduces privacy for both you and the recipient and can result in loss if the recipient doesn't directly control the address.**
trans-unit.target: **Re-use reduces privacy for both you and the recipient and can result in loss if the recipient doesn't directly control the address.**
trans-unit.note: Adress already used alert message - second part

trans-unit.source: **Litewallet is not allowed to access the camera**
trans-unit.target: **Litewallet is not allowed to access the camera**

trans-unit.source: **Go to Settings to allow camera access.**
trans-unit.target: **Go to Settings to allow camera access.**

trans-unit.source: **The destination is your own address. You cannot send to yourself.**
trans-unit.target: **The destination is your own address. You cannot send to yourself.**

trans-unit.note: Could not create transaction alert title
Payee identity not certified alert title.

trans-unit.source: **The destination address is not a valid Litecoin address.**
trans-unit.target: **The destination address is not a valid Litecoin address.**

trans-unit.source: **Pasteboard does not contain a valid Litecoin address.**
trans-unit.target: **Pasteboard does not contain a valid Litecoin address.**

trans-unit.source: **Sending is disabled during a full rescan.**
trans-unit.target: **Sending is disabled during a full rescan.**

trans-unit.note: Could not publish transaction alert title
Could not load remote request error message
Are you enjoying Litewallet alert message body
Start or recover another wallet menu label.

trans-unit.source: **Help improve Litewallet by sharing your anonymous data with us. This does not include any financial information. We respect your financial privacy.**
trans-unit.target: **Help improve Litewallet by sharing your anonymous data with us. This does not include any financial information. We respect your financial privacy.**

trans-unit.source:
**Your paper key is the only way to restore your Litewallet if your mobile is unavailable. No one in the Litecoin Foundation team can give this paper key to you!
We will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
PLEASE MAKE BACKUPS AND DON'T LOSE IT!**
trans-unit.target:
**Your paper key is the only way to restore your Litewallet if your mobile is unavailable. No one in the Litecoin Foundation team can give this paper key to you!
We will show you a list of words to write down on a piece of paper and keep safe.
PLEASE MAKE BACKUPS AND DON'T LOSE IT!**

trans-unit.source: **You last wrote down your paper key on %1$@**
trans-unit.target: **You last wrote down your paper key on %1$@**

trans-unit.source: **The most secure and safest way to use Litecoin.**
trans-unit.target: **The most secure and safest way to use Litecoin.**

trans-unit.note: Syncing view connection state header text
Rescanning header success state header text
Syncing header success state header text
Syncing view syncing state header text
Syncing view connectiong state header text
Syncing view syncing state header text

trans-unit.source: **You can customize your Touch ID spending limit from the %1$@.**
trans-unit.target: **You can customize your Touch ID spending limit from the %1$@.**
trans-unit.note: You can customize your Touch ID Spending Limit from the [TouchIdSettings.linkText gets added here as a button]

trans-unit.source: **Use your fingerprint to unlock your Litewallet and send money up to a set limit.**
trans-unit.target: **Use your fingerprint to unlock your Litewallet and send money up to a set limit.**

trans-unit.source: **You have not set up Touch ID on this device. Go to Settings->Touch ID & Passcode to set it up now.**
trans-unit.target: **You have not set up Touch ID on this device. Go to Settings->Touch ID & Passcode to set it up now.**

trans-unit.source: **You will be asked to enter your 6-digit PIN to send any transaction over your spending limit, and every 48 hours since the last time you entered your 6-digit PIN.**
trans-unit.target: **You will be asked to enter your 6-digit PIN to send any transaction over your spending limit, and every 48 hours since the last time you entered your 6-digit PIN.**
trans-unit.note: Touch ID spending limit screen body
Touch Id spending limit screen title
Timestamp label for event that just happened

trans-unit.source: **Waiting to be confirmed. Some merchants require confirmation to complete a transaction. Estimated time: 1-2 hours.**
trans-unit.target: **Waiting to be confirmed. Some merchants require confirmation to complete a transaction. Estimated time: 1-2 hours.**

trans-unit.note: e.g. I received money from an account.
eg. Confirmed in Block: Not Confirmed
(this transaction was) Received at this address:
(this transaction was) Sent to this address:

trans-unit.target: **Authorize to copy wallet address to clipboard**

Authorize to copy wallet address alert title
Authorize to copy wallet addresses alert message

trans-unit.source: **Remember this PIN. If you forget it, you won't be able to access your Litecoin.**
trans-unit.target: **Remember this PIN. If you forget it, you won't be able to access your Litecoin.**

trans-unit.source: **Your PIN will be used to unlock your Litewallet and send money.**
trans-unit.target: **Your PIN will be used to unlock your Litewallet and send money.**

trans-unit.note: Update PIN failure alert view title

trans-unit.source: **Please enter your PIN to authorize this transaction.**
trans-unit.target: **Please enter your PIN to authorize this transaction.**
trans-unit.note: Verify PIN for transaction view body
Authorize transaction with touch id message

trans-unit.source: **Open the Litewallet iPhone app to set up your wallet.**
trans-unit.target: **Open the Litewallet iPhone app to set up your wallet.**

trans-unit.source: **There was an error loading the content. Please try again.**
trans-unit.target: **There was an error loading the content. Please try again.**

trans-unit.source:
**Litewallet now has a brand new look and some new features.
All coins are displayed in lites (ł). 1 Litecoin (Ł) = 1000 lites (ł).**
trans-unit.target:
**Litewallet now has a brand new look and some new features.
All coins are displayed in lites (ł). 1 Litecoin (Ł) = 1000 lites (ł).**

trans-unit.source: **Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?**
trans-unit.target: **Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?**

trans-unit.source: **To start a new wallet or restore an existing wallet, you must first erase the wallet that is currently installed. To continue, enter the current wallet's Paper Key.**
trans-unit.target: **To start a new wallet or restore an existing wallet, you must first erase the wallet that is currently installed. To continue, enter the current wallet's Paper Key.**
trans-unit.note: Enter key to wipe wallet instruction.

trans-unit.source: **Starting or recovering another wallet allows you to access and manage a different Litewallet wallet on this device.**
trans-unit.target: **Starting or recovering another wallet allows you to access and manage a different Litewallet wallet on this device.**

trans-unit.source: **Your current wallet will be removed from this device. If you wish to restore it in the future, you will need to enter your Paper Key.**
trans-unit.target: **Your current wallet will be removed from this device. If you wish to restore it in the future, you will need to enter your Paper Key.**

trans-unit.source:
**Your LiteWallet is empty. Resetting will delete the old private key and wipe the app data.
After the reset, be prepared to record the new 12 words and keep them in a very secure place.
No LiteWallet developers can retrieve this seed for you.**
trans-unit.target:
**Your LiteWallet is empty. Resetting will delete the old private key and wipe the app data.
After the reset, be prepared to record the new 12 words and keep them in a very secure place.
No LiteWallet developers can retrieve this seed for you.**

trans-unit.source: **Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.**
trans-unit.target: **Write down each word in order and store it in a safe place.**
